mapper.select: select sm.permission from sys_menu sm inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = sm.id inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = srm.role_id where length(sm.permission) > 0 and sm.status = '0' and sm.type = 0 and sur.user_id = #{userId} union select concat(sm.permission, '.', srm.permission) as permission from sys_menu sm inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = sm.id inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = srm.role_id where length(sm.permission) > 0 and sm.status = '0' and sm.type = 0 and sur.user_id = #{userId}
select sur.role_id from sys_user_role sur where sur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct sr.name from sys_role sr inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id where sur.user_id = #{userId}
